title: Font with unique numbers
author: kalee11

comments.content: [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070144/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview) (No. 67 Full Batamweight) by Hoefler Type Foundry
Yes! Haha I should have known, Hoefler and Frere Jones (now apparently Hoefler & Co.) is my absolute favorite foundry.
